attributes.background: We the British people want to have cats banned from the British isles.  They are an invasive species and should be immediately all returned to wherever they come from.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "ban cats".

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244508

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
